languages.text: {n}Брат-эконом Нигмус избран настоятелем Ордена Молота. Его осторожная политика куда больше ориентирована на удовлетворение Вольного Торговца, чем на успешный сбор реликвий святого Когнация.{/n}

{n}Brother Nigmus has been chosen as the prelate of the Order of the Hammer. His careful policy is far more oriented toward satisfying the Rogue Trader than successfully collecting Saint Cognatius's relics.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Брат-эконом Нигмус избран настоятелем Ордена Молота. Его осторожная политика куда больше ориентирована на удовлетворение Вольного Торговца, чем на успешный сбор реликвий святого Когнация.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hermano Nigmus ha sido elegido como prelado de la Orden del Martillo. Su cautelosa política tiene como principal objetivo satisfacer a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en vez de obtener las reliquias de san Cognatius.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le frère Nigmus a été désigné comme nouveau prélat de l'Ordre du Marteau. Sa politique avisée tend davantage à satisfaire {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qu'à parvenir à rassembler les reliques de Saint Cognatius.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Nigmus has been chosen as the prelate of the Order of the Hammer. His careful policy is far more oriented toward satisfying the Rogue Trader than successfully collecting Saint Cognatius's relics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le frère Nigmus a été désigné comme nouveau prélat de l'Ordre du Marteau. Sa politique avisée tend davantage à satisfaire {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qu'à parvenir à rassembler les reliques de Saint Cognatius.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尼格穆斯兄弟被选为重锤修会的新任教长。他行事十分谨慎，对行商浪人有求必应，却不太热衷收集圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Nigmus has been chosen as the prelate of the Order of the Hammer. His careful policy is far more oriented toward satisfying the Rogue Trader than successfully collecting Saint Cognatius's relics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尼格穆斯兄弟被选为圣锤修会的新任教长。他行事十分谨慎，对行商浪人有求必应，却不太热衷收集圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブラザー・ニグムスが、鉄槌の修道会の上級聖職者に選ばれた。彼の慎重な方針は、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を回収することよりも、ローグトレーダーを満足させることに重点が置かれていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Nigmus has been chosen as the prelate of the Order of the Hammer. His careful policy is far more oriented toward satisfying the Rogue Trader than successfully collecting Saint Cognatius's relics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブラザー・ニグムスが、鉄槌の修道会の上級聖職者に選ばれた。彼の慎重な方針は、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を回収することよりも、ローグトレーダーを満足させることに重点が置かれていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bruder Nigmus wurde zum Prälaten des Ordens des Hammers auserkoren. Seine vorsichtige Herangehensweise zielt eher darauf ab, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zufriedenzustellen, denn die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius zu sammeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Nigmus has been chosen as the prelate of the Order of the Hammer. His careful policy is far more oriented toward satisfying the Rogue Trader than successfully collecting Saint Cognatius's relics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bruder Nigmus wurde zum Prälaten des Ordens des Hammers auserkoren. Seine vorsichtige Herangehensweise zielt eher darauf ab, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zufriedenzustellen, denn die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius zu sammeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rahip Nigmus, Çekiç Tarikatı'nın piskoposu olarak seçildi. Dikkatli hareket tarzı, Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârlarını başarıyla toplamaktansa daha çok Hür Tacir'i memnun etmeye odaklanmış hâlde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Brother Nigmus has been chosen as the prelate of the Order of the Hammer. His careful policy is far more oriented toward satisfying the Rogue Trader than successfully collecting Saint Cognatius's relics.{/n}
